intro: Liriosma guianensis, commonly known as the Guianese liriosma, is a herbaceous plant native to tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Marantaceae, which includes plants commonly referred to as arrowroots. The plant features a rhizomatous stem system that allows it to spread vegetatively. Its leaves are typically broad, lance-shaped, and have a smooth or slightly hairy surface. Liriosma guianensis is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and along riverbanks.
